item.title: Trump’s tariffs are becoming such an important revenue source that they’re now propping up America’s debt rating
item.description: "At this time, it appears that meaningful tariff revenue has the potential to offset the deficit-raising aspects of the recent budget legislation."

item.title: ‘Like the corn’s never getting a break. It’s just hot all the time’: How America’s farmers conquered climate change for a ‘monster’ harvest
item.description: Robb Rynd had a tough year full of "melted" ears: “It’s almost kind of depressing to go out there and look at it and say, ‘oh yep, it does look bad."

item.title: Coinbase CEO urged engineers to use AI—then shocked them by firing those who wouldn’t: ‘I went rogue’
item.description: CEO Brian Armstrong gave engineers a week to onboard, then booted those who didn’t.

item.title: Small medical firm plans $400 million Solana purchase as crypto treasury trend spreads
item.description: But Multicoin, Galaxy Digital, and Jump Crypto are reportedly in the market to raise another $1 billion for their own Solana treasury company.

item.title: Gen Zer who built multimillion-dollar companies says work-life balance is a trap and lists 5 ways to ‘optimize ruthlessly’ during your peak years
item.description: “When you front-load success early, you buy the luxury of choice for the rest of your life.”
